name: Mygeni
tag_list: social-media, relevance, content, branded-environments, social-responsobility, revenue-share
overview:
Mygeni is a Content Management System and Bespoke Branded environment.

The major difference from other platforms is that Mygeni engages the user around relevant and highly valuable content, delivered by the users and opted in brands within the brands own bespoke environment. Whilst including the user in the value chain of the mygeni/branded community by sharing its revenue with the user in the way of a loyalty program and collectively with the users nominated community (Brands social upliftment program)

In the this modern age of business and networking you have to â€œdo goodâ€ to do good business. Our team together with our advisers, Emil Ismalon founder of Collarity search engine voted in the top 5 best technologies in the USA last year and Richard Humphries ex CEO Saatchi & Saatchi worldwide have done just this. A state of the art Social Media Content Management System and Bespoke Branded Environment that changes the way you feel about sharing and interacting. This is Mygeni.
